name: Crazy Eight Collector
description:
Crazy Eight Collector is a game in which you add numbered blocks together to make Eight blocks as blocks fall from the top of the screen. Combine Four blocks to explode grey blocks. Watch out, because as the Eight blocks collect at the bottom of the screen, the number of available tiles you can use will decrease!

This game was made in the 33rd GM48, and then polished with graphics, sound design, music, balancing, debugging and more for a full post-jam release on itch.io.

If you have any suggestions, please feel free to leave them in the comments.
